results.title: A role for metformin in the treatment of Dupuytren disease?
results.text_hl: A role for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Dupuytren_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004387 @@@Dupuytren disease@@@?

citations.NLM: Baeri A, Levraut M, Diazzi S, Camuzard O, Cegarra-Escolano M, Ploumellec MA, Balaguer T, Fassy J, Rezzonico R, Bellusci S, Mari B, Vassaux G. A role for metformin in the treatment of Dupuytren disease? Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 Jun;150():112930. PMID: 35427821
citations.BibTeX: @article{35427821, title={A role for metformin in the treatment of Dupuytren disease?}, author={Baeri A and Levraut M and Diazzi S and Camuzard O and Cegarra-Escolano M and Ploumellec MA and Balaguer T and Fassy J and Rezzonico R and Bellusci S and Mari B and Vassaux G}, journal={Biomed Pharmacother}, volume={150}, pages={112930}}

results.title: Dupuytren's disease risk factors.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ was a significant risk factor for @<m>DISEASE_Dupuytren_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004387 @@@Dupuytren's disease@@@ (OR=1.75) and there was an increased risk for medicinally treated @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@--OR=3.56; @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulphonylureas@@@--OR=1.75) and particularly @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ controlled (OR=4.38) rather than diet-controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Geoghegan JM, Forbes J, Clark DI, Smith C, Hubbard R. Dupuytren's disease risk factors. J Hand Surg Br. 2004 Oct;29(5):423-6. PMID: 15336742
citations.BibTeX: @article{15336742, title={Dupuytren's disease risk factors.}, author={Geoghegan JM and Forbes J and Clark DI and Smith C and Hubbard R}, journal={J Hand Surg Br}, volume={29}, number={5}, pages={423-6}}
